org.transitime.core.travelTimes

Class TravelTimeInfoMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.core.travelTimes.TravelTimeInfoMap

  • public class TravelTimeInfoMap
extends java.lang.Object
    For keeping track of the historic data such that if no data is available for a trip then can find closest trip. Keyed by trip pattern and stop path index.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TravelTimeInfoMap() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(TravelTimeInfo travelTimeInfo)
      Adds the new TravelTimeInfo object to the static travelTimesByTripPattern map so that can find best match for trip for when there is no data for the actual trip.
      boolean dataExists(java.lang.String tripPatternId)
      Returns true if there is at least some historic data for the specified trip pattern.
      TravelTimeInfoWithHowSet getBestMatch(Trip trip, int stopPathIndex)
      For when don't have historic data for a trip.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TravelTimeInfoMap

        public TravelTimeInfoMap()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(TravelTimeInfo travelTimeInfo)
        Adds the new TravelTimeInfo object to the static travelTimesByTripPattern map so that can find best match for trip for when there is no data for the actual trip.
        Parameters:
        travelTimeInfo -

      • dataExists

        public boolean dataExists(java.lang.String tripPatternId)
        Returns true if there is at least some historic data for the specified trip pattern.
        Parameters:
        tripPatternId - Trip pattern to see if there is data for
        Returns:
        True if there is historic data

      • getBestMatch

        public TravelTimeInfoWithHowSet getBestMatch(Trip trip,
                                    int stopPathIndex)
        For when don't have historic data for a trip. This method determines the trip with historic data for the same service class that has the nearest time. If no historic data for a trip with the same service ID then will look at trips with other service IDs.
        Parameters:
        trip - The Trip that needs travel time info
        stopPathIndex - The stop in the trip that needs travel time info
        Returns:
        The best match for the trip or null if there was no historic info for the tripPatternId/stopPathIndex.
